æœ€å°ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã§å‹•ã„ã¦æ¬²ã—ã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã€vimã ã¨å…¨ç”»é¢ã®fzfèµ·å‹•ã«ãªã£ã¦ã€neovimã ã¨ãã‚‚ãã‚‚è½ã¡ã‚‹
```function! s:foo()
  let s:cmdtype = getcmdtype()
  if s:cmdtype == ':'
    let a = fzf#run({ 'source':  'ls -1', 'sink': { lines -> lines } })
    return a[0]
  endif
endfunction
cnoremap <expr> <C-r> <SID>foo()```
`:Gina checkout <Tab>` ã¨ã‹ã§ `git branch` ã‹ã‚‰è£œå®Œã—ã¦ `:Gina checkout {branch}` ã«fallbackã—ãŸã„

```function! s:run(...) abort
  call fzf#run({'source': 'ls -l'})
endfunction

function! s:hoge() abort
  call timer_start(0, funcref("s:run"))
  return "\<Esc>"
endfunction

cnoremap <expr> a <SID>hoge()```
